body_html:
"Maybe pytorch can use some of the libraries provided by torch7?" means Maybe the libTH*.so files provided by torch7 can be used to compile pytorch. In this way Debian maintainers (and maybe other distributions) can reduce work maintaining pytorch/torch packages.

Pytorch and Torch7 cannot share the same .so files unless the TH_INDEX_BASE issue is solved -- Is my understanding correct?
body_text:
"Maybe pytorch can use some of the libraries provided by torch7?" means Maybe the libTH*.so files provided by torch7 can be used to compile pytorch. In this way Debian maintainers (and maybe other distributions) can reduce work maintaining pytorch/torch packages.
Pytorch and Torch7 cannot share the same .so files unless the TH_INDEX_BASE issue is solved -- Is my understanding correct?
body:
`"Maybe pytorch can use some of the libraries provided by torch7?"` means Maybe the `libTH*.so` files provided by torch7 can be used to compile pytorch. In this way Debian maintainers (and maybe other distributions) can reduce work maintaining pytorch/torch packages.

Pytorch and Torch7 cannot share the same .so files unless the `TH_INDEX_BASE` issue is solved -- Is my understanding correct?
